entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 12.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: SW 46 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 16.
